Text:
this torrent is being poisoned. If you look at the peers, and see this one "available.above.net", please block it. It's killing the speed.

if you use utorrent, make a file in utorrent directory called ipfilter.dat. Edit it with notepad and enter the line: 209.249.10.1 - 209.249.10.200
Did this take forever to download? How's the quality? Is it legit?
